snippet: President Obama defended his cautious response to evidence that the Syrian government had used chemical weapons, saying he could not act based on a “perceived” use of such  weapons.
lead_paragraph: President Obama defended his cautious response to evidence that the Syrian government had used chemical weapons, saying he could not act based on a “perceived” use of such  weapons.

headline.seo: No Easy Answers on Syria, Obama Says
headline.main: No Easy Answers on Syria, Obama Says
